title: odunybiz
author: odunybiz
created_time: October 30, 2023, 10:53:15 PMLast edit: October 30, 2023, 11:03:51 PM by odunybiz
content: Do you use a mobile phone? How do you recharge your phone? Do you buy your recharge card in a store or load your phone through USSD from your bank account? I recently went to the bank to demand for my statement of account for a year due to some personal reasons.I was shocked on how often I recharge from my bank account. Over 70% of the transaction I did was on phone recharge. Then I asked myself "if I'm to buy recharge cards in a store, can I buy as much as this within a year"? The answer here is NO. This means I would have saved more if I buy directly from a store. Alot of people have similar issue. Buying recharge card directly from your bank using USSD look simple but may affect your savings if no concrete budget is made for your monthly earnings. This will make you load card unnecessarily and therefore will increase your SMS monthly charges by your bank. This SMS charges may be small but is something for an average man after accumulating over time.CONCLUSIONIt is highly convenience to recharge airtime from your bank account using USSD even in the midnight in as much as possible you have money in your account and you have enrol for USSD transaction on your phone but this isn't an healthy measure for your saving as it enable you to make some unnecessary recharge especially when talking with love ones. Instead of been brief with your discussion when you observed you are out of airtime, you will rather keep talking and buy more airtime from your bank after exhausting the recent airtime. It's advisable to get recharge card from a store than buying using USSD from your bank account.

comments.author: Jegileman
comments.body: This won’t affect your savings if you have a good plan mapped out for your savings. You can always save through your bank by activating “Save as you Spend”. It is a feature that saves some percentage of money from your total money anytime you spend from your account. It is a good way to save money because it promotes savings. Your inability to save money and obsessed with buying airtime from your account is because of lack of plan for it. Everything needs proper planing and if you don’t engage in one, your money will crumble with time without giving an account for it..

Inasmuch as your money is left in the bank, there's no way you won't get access to your money it's just that if you stop using USSD or mobile app, it will only reduce your ability to get access to your account easily but it doesn't mean that your money will be safe because their are still people that any day you go to bank you will still see them. The only way one can stop habits that will affect our savings is to learn a good savings standard, like one needs to be discipline not every little thing you go to bank or you use your phone to make transactions as without discipline it cannot be easy to achieve good results not only in savings lifestyle but also in whichever businesses one is doing.Another factor that one can emulate in other to inhibit factors that might affect one's savings is to open a fixed deposit account; this factor is very important for any individual that wants to develop a good savings lifestyle because in fix deposit, you won't be able to get access to your account till a day that you've agreed with the bank to start making withdrawals.Again giving loans to trusted individuals or banks is another way not to make our savings accessible to us, because when you give out loans the money won't be in your custody anymore till an agreed date that the money would be refunded. This is a very good factor because most times in giving out a loan, an interest is involved so during the duration by which the money would be paid you will get the higher amount of what is loan out so if you loan out your money to a trusted person, organization or bank is the best choice is learning a good savings habit.

comments.author: EluguHcman
comments.body: It is a wise say @ OP. This is just why a fund saving box does not require an opening to avoid extracting of already inputted fund unless the box is broken but supposen to be at when one has reached a durational target such may be annually, monthly or weekly. Basically depends on ones plans. At a time, I considered that activating my mobile App or USSD would grease my reckless spendings because I could be offered those self financial service transactions that is possibly to unnecessity but as earlier self awareness, I could take caution to self control to sn extend.Imagine being on the YouTube or Netflix just for fun and you runs out of data and you have some money in your account. Nomatter what the money was in your bank account is budgeted for, it would take just courage not to temper the money as long the fun was interesting and was unsatisfied. And gradually you are ignorantly spending your money unnecessarily on facts that may not bring you valuable increments.Some silly Nigerians in the social media would say... "You are out of the world without data" and some says... "I would even have my last card to get data" all buttressed to having just fun in the internet.And unconsciously, this system of purchasing airtime with mobile networks is enticing to relax and  chills beyond unnecessary measures relying on data or airtime subscriptions.It is also triggered to unnecessary charity giveaways.Hence, if one can take adequate conciousness to expenses, then it is a good service because it helps run an individual cashless policy where your expenses would be  minimally economized because the more the cash at hand is inspired to more unwarranted expenses and also would save you the additional certain charges the physical purchases would charge you on the basis of using inflations as an excuse.
